text: Laki Marwat Junction railway station () is located in Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways *The Rise and Fall of a Railway Junction Category:Railway stations in Lakki Marwat District Category:Railway stations on Bannu–Tank Branch Line Category:Railway stations on Daud Khel–Lakki Marwat Branch Line
title: Laki Marwat Junction railway station
